description: Installation of an air conditioning unit to the side of the property in a timber, acoustic enclosure
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (GA00, GA01, Noise impact assessment, planning statement Received: 06/06/2022; PA01-A, PA02-A, Received: 21/06/2022) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The air conditioning unit hereby permitted shall not be used prior to the installation of permanent acoustic enclosures around as stated within the submitted Noise Impact Assessment and level of noise emitted shall be 10dB(A) below the existing background noise level at all times that the unit operates.
